description:
Listed Building Consent  in connection with partial demolition, alteration, extension and change of use of building A,B,D F, and associated outbuildings and structures, to provide a mixed use scheme comprising residential (C3). business (B1) Retail (A1, A2, A3 including relocation of post office counter), leisure (D2) serviced apartments (temporary sleeping accommodation as defined by the Greater London Planning Act 1973) performance space, rehearsal space and theatre storage, with associated access, parking and landscaping.
NB Parallel Planning application Ref P052245 and Conservation area consent Ref P052247also made.
decision_conditions:
Original panel doors shall be retained and where no longer required to provide access shall be maintained in their original position.
REASON: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building included in the Statutory List.
